Class ShipObject

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class ShipObject
extends GameEntity
    ShipObject.java

    Defines a base object for the Main Weapon.

    Version:
    1.1 15/04/2015
    Author:
    Davide Teixeria

    • Field Detail

      • mainWeapon

        protected BaseWeaponComponent mainWeapon
        Ship's main weapon.

        Suposed to be activated by pressing the screen's right side.

      • shield

        protected BaseShieldComponent shield
        Ship's shield generator.

        As a passive element, the shields regenerate automaticly while enabled.

      • ability

        protected BaseAbilityComponent ability
        Ship's ability.

        Suposed to be activated by pressing the screen's left side.

      • special

        protected BaseSpecialComponent special
        Ship's special passive.

        As a passive element, the special passive is always working and cannot be deactivated.

      • boosters

        protected java.util.List<BaseBoosterComponent> boosters
        Ship's boosters.

        As a passive element, the boosters are always working and cannot be deactivated. Boosters here are being used and cannot be returned to player.

      • HP

        float HP
        Ship's health points.

      • boosterLimit

        static final int boosterLimit
        Maximum booster amount that a ship can use.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • startPositionX

        static final int startPositionX
        Ship's start position on X axis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • startPositionY

        static final int startPositionY
        Ship's start position on Y axis.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • texture

        static final org.andengine.opengl.texture.region.ITiledTextureRegion texture
        Ship's texture's array.

        0 - Ship turning left.

        1 - Ship at normal state.

        2 - Ship turning right.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ShipObject

        public ShipObject()
        Creates a new empty ship.
